description:
the orb lights, changes colors, you hear voices telling you to leave. <color=red>it may not be too late</color>- a resounding crash from outside, stones collapsing around you, blocking your way out. <color=purple>you have done well. all will be well now.</color> stones collapse around you. a small stone strikes your head, you reach up to feel warm, wet-

 a crack. blackness. <color=purple>you have served your purpose</color>
